building-assembler-mk1.name: Assembler
building-assembler-mk1.description:
Crafts two parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

building-oil-refinery.name: Refinery
building-oil-refinery.description:
Refines fluid and/or solid parts into other parts.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Contains both a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input and output, to allow for the automation of various recipes.

building-foundry-mk1.name: Foundry
building-foundry-mk1.description:
Smelts two resources into alloy ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore into it with a conveyor belt connected to the inputs. The produced ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

building-manufacturer-mk1.name: Manufacturer
building-manufacturer-mk1.description:
Crafts three or four parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

building-constructor-mk1.name: Constructor
building-constructor-mk1.description:
Crafts one part into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

building-smelter-mk1.name: Smelter
building-smelter-mk1.description:
Smelts ore into ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

building-packager.name: Packager
building-packager.description:
Used for the packaging and unpacking of fluids.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Contains both a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input and output, to allow for the automation of various recipes.

building-train-docking-station.name: Freight Platform
building-train-docking-station.description:
Freight Cars that stop at the Freight Platform will be loaded or unloaded by the Freight Platform.
Loading and unloading options can be set inside the building.
Snaps to other Platforms, Stations, and Rails.
Needs to be connected to a powered Railway to function.

building-train-docking-station-liquid.name: Fluid Freight Platform
building-train-docking-station-liquid.description:
Freight Cars that stop at the Freight Platform will be loaded or unloaded by the Freight Platform.
Loading and unloading options can be set inside the building.
Snaps to other Platforms, Stations, and Rails.
Needs to be connected to a powered Railway to function.

building-conveyor-attachment-merger.name: Conveyor Merger
building-conveyor-attachment-merger.description: Merges up to three conveyor belts into one.

building-conveyor-attachment-splitter.name: Conveyor Splitter
building-conveyor-attachment-splitter.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three. 
Useful to move parts and resources from oversaturated conveyor belts.

building-conveyor-attachment-splitter-pr.name: Programmable Splitter
building-conveyor-attachment-splitter-pr.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three. 
You can set rules for each output to decide exactly where each part should go.

building-conveyor-attachment-splitter-sm.name: Smart Splitter
building-conveyor-attachment-splitter-sm.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three. 
You can set a rule for which part should go to the left and which part should go to the right.

building-conveyor-belt-mk1.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.1
building-conveyor-belt-mk1.description: Transports up to 60 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

building-conveyor-belt-mk2.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.2
building-conveyor-belt-mk2.description: Transports up to 120 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

building-conveyor-belt-mk3.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.3
building-conveyor-belt-mk3.description: Transports up to 270 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

building-conveyor-belt-mk4.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.4
building-conveyor-belt-mk4.description: Transports up to 480 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

building-conveyor-belt-mk5.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.5
building-conveyor-belt-mk5.description: Transports up to 780 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

building-generator-biomass.name: Biomass Burner
building-generator-biomass.description:
Burns various forms of biomass to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has no input and must therefore be fed biomass manually.

Resource consumption will automatically be lowered to meet power demands.

building-generator-coal.name: Coal Generator
building-generator-coal.description:
Burns Coal to boil Water, the produced steam rotates turbines to generate electricty for the power grid.
Has a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input, so both the Coal and Water supply can be automated.

Resource consumption will automatically be lowered to meet power demands.

building-generator-fuel.name: Fuel Generator
building-generator-fuel.description:
Consumes Fuel to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has a Pipe input so the Fuel supply can be automated.

Resource consumption will automatically be lowered to meet power demands.

building-generator-geo-thermal.name: Geothermal Generator
building-generator-geo-thermal.description:
Can only be built on geyser nodes.
Generates electricity for your power grid.
Does not require any resources to be input.

building-generator-integrated-biomass.name: Biomass Burner
building-generator-integrated-biomass.description: Burns Biomass to produce power. Biomass must be loaded manually and is obtained by picking up flora in the world. Produces up to 20MW of power while operating.

building-generator-nuclear.name: Nuclear Power Plant
building-generator-nuclear.description:
Consumes Nuclear Fuel Rods and Water to produce electricty for the power grid.

Produces Nuclear Waste, which is extracted from the conveyor belt output.

Resource consumption will automatically be lowered to meet power demands.

building-industrial-tank.name: Industrial Fluid Buffer
building-industrial-tank.description:
Can contain up to 2400m³ of fluid.
Has an in and output for pipes.

building-miner-mk1.name: Miner Mk1
building-miner-mk1.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 60 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

building-miner-mk2.name: Miner Mk.2
building-miner-mk2.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 120 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

building-miner-mk3.name: Miner Mk.3
building-miner-mk3.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 240 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

building-oil-pump.name: Oil Extractor
building-oil-pump.description:
Normal extraction rate: 120m³ oil per minute.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Can be build on an Oil Node to extract Crude Oil. Extraction rates depend on node purity.

building-pipeline.name: Pipeline Mk.1
building-pipeline.description:
Outside indicators show volume, flow rate and direction.
Transports up to 300m³ of fluid per minute.
Used to transport fluids.

building-pipeline-junction-cross.name: Pipeline Junction Cross
building-pipeline-junction-cross.description: Can be attached to a pipeline to split it 4-way.

building-pipeline-mk2.name: Pipeline Mk.2
building-pipeline-mk2.description:
Outside indicators show volume, flow rate and direction.
Transports up to 600m³ of fluid per minute.
Used to transport fluids.

building-pipeline-pump.name: Pipeline Pump Mk.1
building-pipeline-pump.description:
Can be attached to a Pipeline to apply Head Lift.
Maximum Head Lift: 20 meters
(Allows fluids to be transported 20 meters upwards.)

NOTE: Has an in- and output direction.
NOTE: Head Lift does not stack, so space between Pumps is recommended.

building-pipeline-pump-mk2.name: Pipeline Pump Mk.2
building-pipeline-pump-mk2.description:
Can be attached to a Pipeline to apply Head Lift.
Maximum Head Lift: 50 meters
(Allows fluids to be transported 50 meters upwards.)

NOTE: Has an in- and output direction.
NOTE: Head Lift does not stack, so space between Pumps is recommended.

building-pipe-storage-tank.name: Fluid Buffer
building-pipe-storage-tank.description:
Can contain up to 400m³ of fluid.
Has an in and output for pipes.

building-resource-sink.name: AWESOME Sink
building-resource-sink.description:
Got excess resources? Fear not, for FICSIT does not waste! The newly developed AWESOME Sink turns any useful part straight into research data, as fast as you can supply it! 
Participating pioneers will be compensated with Coupons to be spend at the AWESOME Shop.

building-storage-container-mk1.name: Storage Container
building-storage-container-mk1.description:
Contains 24 slots for storing large amounts of items.
Has an input and output for conveyor belts.

building-storage-container-mk2.name: Industrial Storage Container
building-storage-container-mk2.description:
Contains 48 slots for storing large amounts of items.
Has two inputs and outputs for conveyor belts.

building-storage-integrated.name: Personal Storage Box
building-storage-integrated.description: A box you can put things in.                                          Has 25 inventory slots.

building-storage-player.name: Personal Storage Box
building-storage-player.description: Contains 25 slots for storing large amounts of items.

building-truck-station.name: Truck Station
building-truck-station.description:
Either send or receive resources to vehicles. Has an inventory with 48 slots.
Transfers up to 120 stacks per minute to/from docked vehicle. 
Always refuels vehicles if it has access to a matching fuel type.

building-valve.name: Valve
building-valve.description:
Used to limit Pipeline flow rates.
Can be attached to a Pipeline.

NOTE: Has an in- and output direction.

building-water-pump.name: Water Extractor
building-water-pump.description:
Default extraction rate: 120m³ water per minute.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Extracts water from the body of water it is build on.
Note that the water needs to be deep enough and that rivers do not commonly suffice.

building-space-elevator.name: Space Elevator
building-space-elevator.description:
Requires deliveries of special Project Parts to complete Phases of Project Assembly.
Completing Phases in the Space Elevator will unlock new Tiers in the HUB Terminal.
